The City of Anahuac
-------------------

Nestled along the banks of the Trinity River in present day Chambers County; lies the historic town of Anahuac. For over 150 years this small sight played a significant part in early Texas History. It has a colorful past, and is a tale worth retelling. The earliest inhabitants of the Texas coast were members of the Karankawa Indian tribe.

[Learn Our History](https://anahuac.us/living-visiting/tourism/history/)
![image](https://anahuac.us/wp-content/themes/anahuac/assets/images/welcome.jpg)

This budget will raise more revenue from property taxes than last year’s budget by an amount of $6,838.00, which is a .0096 increase from last year’s budget. The property tax revenue to be raised from new property added to the tax roll this year is $70,742.
